pages.title: JEI
pages.text: JEI is the mod that lets you look up all of the items in the game to your right. Since there are a lot of items in the game it is important to know how to find what you are looking for.$(br2)This entry gives tips on how to utilize the mod to make everyhting easier.

pages.title: Specific mod
pages.text: If you want to look up a specific mod's items you can type the $(n)@$() symbol following with the mod name:$(br2)$(li)@simplyswords$(li)@iceandfire$(li)@irons_spellbooks$(li)@born_in_chaos_v1$()

pages.title: Recipes
pages.text: To see all the uses of an item, hover over the item and press: $(3)$(n)$(k:jei.showUses)$()$(br2)If you want to see the recipe for an item, hover over it and press $(3)$(n)$(k:jei.showRecipe)$()$(br2)If you want to bookmark a recipe, hover over an item and press $(3)$(n)$(k:jei.bookmark)

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: If you want to craft a bookmarked recipe, hover over the recipe and press $(3)$(n)$(k:jei.transferRecipeBookmark)$()$(br2)If you want to craft the max amount of a bookmarked recipe, hover over the recipe and press $(3)$(n)$(k:jei.maxTransferRecipeBookmark)
